exclusion:
• Put your primary controller in exclusion mode
  • Short press the button at the back of the sensor once.
  • The 4-in-1 Motion Sensor LED will blink, If the exclusion is successful, then LED will stay on for 2 seconds. Otherwise, the LED will blink until timeout, in which case you need to repeat the process from step b.
inclusion:
• Put your primary controller in inclusion mode
  • Short press the button at the back of the sensor once.
  • The 4-in-1 Motion Sensor LED will blink, If the inclusion is successful, then LED will stay on for 2 seconds. Otherwise, the LED will blink until timeout, in which case you need to repeat the process from step b.
label: HA-ZW-5SABC
overview: The 4-in-1 motion sensor is designed for using with scenes in home automation systems, integrate motion, light, temperature and humidity sensors, powered by CR123A battery or MicroUSB cable. The Motion Sensor lets you know when movement is detected in a certain area and can trigger different actions in response to that movement (or lack of movement). It also lets you know the ambient temperature and humidity to trigger different actions to make you more comfort.
wakeup: To wake up the sensor so that your hub can send it configuration parameters quickly press on the button on the back 3 times.

parameters.label: Low Battery Power Level Alarm
parameters.description: Value at which sensor reports low battery to the gateway

parameters.label: PIR Trigger Time
parameters.description: PIR Trigger Time (Time Between PIR Readings)
parameters.overview:
The amount of seconds between motion detection (ie. interval)

5 = 5 seconds

parameters.label: Basic Set Command Send after PIR Trigger
parameters.description: Basic Set Command Send after PIR Trigger
parameters.overview:
Should Basic Set Command be sent after PIR is triggered:

0=No, 1 = Yes

parameters.label: PIR Trigger Correspondence Action
parameters.overview:
Ability to reverse the Basic Set behavior for devices associated in group 2.

0 = Turn the associated device ON when motion is tripped, and OFF when motion stops.

1 = Turn the associated device OFF when motion is tripped, and ON when motion stops.

parameters.label: Change Parameters 101-104 Back to Default Settings
parameters.description: Change Parameters 101-104 Back to Default Settings
parameters.overview: If changes are made to parameters 101-104, you can set parameter 100 to 1 to reset 101-104 back to default.

parameters.label: Temperature Reporting Interval
parameters.overview:
The interval between when temperature is reported to the gateway

0=Off, 1 = 1 second

(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)

parameters.label: Humidity Reporting Interval
parameters.overview:
The interval between when humidity is reported to the gateway

0 = Off, 1 = 1 second

(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)

parameters.label: Luminance Reporting Interval
parameters.overview:
The interval between when luminance is reported to the gateway

0 = Off, 1 = 1 second

(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)

parameters.label: Battery Reporting Interval
parameters.overview:
The interval between when battery is reported to the gateway

0 = Off, 1 = 1 second

(Note: the sensor reporting time will round to the nearest minute)

parameters.label: Change Parameters 111-114 Back to Default Settings
parameters.description: Change Parameters 111-114 Back to Default Settings
parameters.overview: If changes are made to parameters 111-114, you can set parameter 110 to 1 to reset 111-114 back to default.

parameters.label: Temperature Threshold
parameters.overview:
Set the threshold of the temperature for your sensor

1 = 0.1 degree Celsius, 500 = 50 degrees Celsius

parameters.label: Humidity Threshold
parameters.overview:
Set the threshold of the humidity for your sensor

1 = 1%, 2 = 2%

parameters.label: Luminance Threshold
parameters.overview:
Set the threshold of the luminance for your sensor

1 = 1 unit lux, 2 = 2 unit lux

parameters.label: Battery Threshold
parameters.overview:
Set the threshold of the battery for your sensor

1 = 1%, 2 = 2%

associations.label: Group 1
associations.overview:
1. Notification Report
    Sensor will send notification report when motion detection unknown location and (event inactive)
  2. Multilevel Sensor Report
    Sensor will send multilevel sensor report (temperature, humidity, luminance) interval of 2 hours
  3. Battery Report
    Sensor will send battery report when the battery level is low and the battery report's value is 0xFF
  4. Device Reset Locally

associations.label: Group 2
associations.description: Send Basic Set when PIR is triggered
